description: This file contains utility functions for computing metrics related to daily activity data, such as per-behavior metrics, hourly activity series, and peak hours, primarily used for visualizing or analyzing activity patterns.

methods.name: computePerBehaviorMetrics(activities, dayStartISO, dayEndISO)
methods.description: Calculates total occurrences, durations, averages, and percentage of day per behavior based on activity records within specified day start and end ISO timestamps.

methods.name: buildHourlySeries(activities, dayStartISO)
methods.description: Builds an hourly breakdown of activity durations and occurrences, aggregating data per behavior for each hour of the day.

methods.name: findPeakHours(hourlySeries, options = { by: 'duration', topN: 3 })
methods.description: Identifies the top N peak hours based on total activity duration or occurrence count from the hourly series data.

methods.name: formatMs(ms)
methods.description: Converts a duration in milliseconds to a human-readable string format (mm:ss or hh:mm).
